CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Appel entrant"),IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/Appelentrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Appel sortant"),IMAGE("/resource/1510072374000/Appelsortant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Courrier entrant"),IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/CourrierEntrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Courrier sortant"),IMAGE("/resource/1510072645000/CourrierSortant?isdtp=p1t",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Email entrant"),IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/EmailEntrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c , "Email sortant"),IMAGE("/resource/1510072535000/EmailSortant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Origine__c, "Formulaire de contact"), IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/FormulaireContact?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL(Origine__c, "Facebook"), IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/FacebookEntrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL(Origine__c, "Twitter"), IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/TwitterEntrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL(Origine__c, "Critizr"), IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/CritizrEntrant?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), IF(ISPICKVAL(Origine__c, "Salle"), IMAGE("/resource/1507642306000/Iconesalle?isdtp=p1",".png",30,30), "")))))))))))
